articles.title: Senate confirms Marco Rubio as secretary of state, giving Trump the first member of his Cabinet
articles.description: The Senate confirmed Marco Rubio as secretary of state Monday, voting unanimously to give President Donald Trump the first member of his new Cabinet.

articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: Biden Ends Presidency With Fears of Trump’s Retribution
articles.description: “We’re not leaving the fight,” he told supporters and members of his staff as he prepared to leave Washington.
articles.content:
For four years as president, and for almost a half-century more in public life, Joseph R. Biden Jr. professed an optimistic, ironclad belief in the strength of America’s democracy.
But in the final moments of his presidency, Mr. Biden struck an uncha... [519 chars]

articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: US Senate passes migrant detention bill hours after Trump sworn in
articles.description: Laken Riley Act, which passed 64-35, requires detention of undocumented migrants charged with theft-related crimes
articles.content:
The Senate has passed legislation requiring the detention of undocumented immigrants charged with theft-related crimes, with the chamber approving its first bill of the new Congress just hours after Donald Trump took the oath of office.

articles.title: Trump inauguration, South Korea PPI
articles.description: Investors await greater clarity on policies in the U.S. following Donald Trump's inauguration.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets mostly rose Tuesday, as investors awaited greater clarity on policies of U.S. President Donald Trump following his inauguration.
Australia's S&P/ASX 200 advanced 0.66% to end the day at 8,402.40.
